tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I felt so comfortable with her really!!! She explained the whole process in detail and with patience because trust me I can really be a big inconvenience when it comes to dental procedures! And the work was really well done !!! Overall experience was fantastic and would definitely recommend!!!

Dr.Bairavi is so caring and explaining the doubts..
Easy to reach in case of emergency...
My daughter met with an accident and her front tooth got half broken...
Within 15 mins I was able to reach doctor and treatment was done within half an hour..
Thank you so much for your care

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Everything was very satisfying. Had no problem  as such for  anything .Both Dr Bairavi, and Dr Raghu  were very helpful in  everything.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Doctor explained about the possible methods of correction clearly and patiently. She asked our choice among the three and planned to continue further....

Before starting the procedure, sat with my child and made her comfortable. 

Way of treatment is good
